review: The MXR La Machine CSP203 is a fantastic fuzz pedal that delivers a thick, shaggy sound perfect for 70s-style hard rock and modern garage rock. The octave feature adds an extra layer of depth, creating a raw and searing tone. The build quality is solid, making it reliable for both studio and live performances. While there is a slight volume drop when not using the octave, the overall sound and performance are excellent, making it a great addition to any pedalboard.
